title: Sante EcoLoco
description: A chic health boutique carries everything from exclusive vitamins and snacks to hand-picked beauty items and locally made products. The educated staff includes a knowledgeable naturopath available all day Monday-Friday for personal consultations. Caters to vegan, gluten-free, lactose-free and organic diets. Dedicated to supporting local businesses and stocks products such as oils and vinegars, as well as ready-made food from Aux Vivres Restaurant.
